Class PrintLocationAction

java.lang.Object
gw.api.print.PrintAction
gw.api.print.PrintLocationAction
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class PrintLocationAction extends PrintAction
Outputs a given location to PDF.

    • generateContent

      @InternalAPI @Deprecated public void generateContent(IPrintContext context) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Internal method. Do not use.
      Writes XSL-FO code for our destination to the printer context. Generates a single page sequence using our destination to produce both the page header and body.
      Specified by:
      generateContent in class PrintAction
      Parameters:
      context - print context to use for printing
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException if PDF generation fails
